channel.title: Easy question? How do i make npcs attackable?
channel.description: i added the kree'arra npc and i made it agressive and everything but i just cant find out how to make it so i can attack it .

item.title: Easy question? How do i make npcs attackable?

item.description:
@h3llk03r wrote:

Im not trying to be a dick but you are retarded. I said i “added an npc” i didnt say it was already there. therefore there were no previous codes / ids from that npc…
